metadata.title: CVE-2022-48738 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ASoC:ops: Reject out of bounds values in snd_soc_put_volsw() We don't currentlyvalidate that the values being set are within the range we advertised touserspace as being valid, do so and reject any values that are out ofrange.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
